text:
Archbishop Sebouh Chouldjian (born Haik Sarkis Chouldjian; March 24, 1959 – November 19, 2020) was a Turkish-born Armenian Apostolic prelate. He was the Archbishop of the Diocese of Gougark from 1996 until his death. He was born in Malatya, Turkey.
Chouldjian died of COVID-19 on November 19, 2020 in Yerevan, Armenia at the age of 61.
